location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 1073: Charles Norris, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay, to David Anderson Blane, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter Charles Norris, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay, writes to David Anderson Blane, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to acknowledge receipt of a letter dated 4 June 1833 regarding the affairs of the Arab tribes on the south coast of the Gulf and to advise that the Governor in Council approves of Blane's proceedings reported in that letter. He observes that in reference to that letter, the Wahabee [Wahabi] representative would be the proper person to address in future.
